definition[0]: a method of communication, in which messages are written on a special machine and then sent using the telephone network
definition[1]: a message sent in this way
definition[2]: a system of sending written messages from one business to another along telephone lines or by SATELLITE. This system has been widely replaced by FAX and E-MAIL
example[2]: a telex from our Kenya office
definition[3]: to send a message, piece of information etc to someone using a telex
